metadata.title: CVE-2024-49395 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In mutt and neomutt, PGP encryption does not use the --hidden-recipientmode which may leak the Bcc email header field by inferring from therecipients info.

criterions.comment: mutt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no fix planned').
neomutt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
